application.name: VEEAM Backup & Recovery - Backup Job(s) By VMs
VEEAM Backup & Recovery - BackupSync Job(s) By VMs
VEEAM Backup & Recovery - EndPoint Backup job(s)

trigger.name: Less than 7 Days left on Veeam Rental License
Less than 15 Days left on Veeam Rental License
Less than 30 Days left on Veeam Rental License

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template VEEAM - Backup and Replication:vbr[RunStatus,{#JOBID}].avg(21600)}=1 and {Template VEEAM - Backup and Replication:vbr[Type,{#JOBID}].regexp(BackupSync)}=0
trigger_prototype.name: The VEEAM job {#JOBNAME} has been running more than 6h

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template VEEAM - Backup and Replication:vbr[RunStatus,{#JOBID}].avg(28800)}=1 and {Template VEEAM - Backup and Replication:vbr[Type,{#JOBID}].regexp(BackupSync)}=0
trigger_prototype.name: The VEEAM job {#JOBNAME} has been running more than 8h

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template VEEAM - Backup and Replication:vbr[RunStatus,{#JOBID}].avg(43200)}=1 and {Template VEEAM - Backup and Replication:vbr[Type,{#JOBID}].regexp(BackupSync)}=0
trigger_prototype.name: The VEEAM job {#JOBNAME} has been running more than 12h

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template VEEAM - Backup and Replication:vbr[RunStatus,{#JOBID}].avg(86400)}=1 and {Template VEEAM - Backup and Replication:vbr[Type,{#JOBID}].regexp(BackupSync)}=0
trigger_prototype.name: The VEEAM job {#JOBNAME} has been running more than 24h

application.name: VEEAM Backup & Recovery - BackupSync Job(s) By VMs

trigger_prototype.name: 4 Days Without Backups for {#JOBVMNAME} in Job:{#JOBNAME
trigger_prototype.description: No backups have completed for {#JOBVMNAME} in the last 4 days, with or without a warning.

trigger_prototype.name: 7 Days Without Backups for {#JOBVMNAME} in Job:{#JOBNAME}
trigger_prototype.description: No backups have completed for {#JOBVMNAME} in the last 7 days, with or without a warning.

trigger_prototype.name: 14 Days Without Backups for {#JOBVMNAME} in Job:{#JOBNAME}
trigger_prototype.description: No backups have completed for {#JOBVMNAME} in the last 14 days, with or without a warning.

application.name: VEEAM Backup & Recovery - Backup Job(s) By VMs

application.name: VEEAM Backup & Recovery - EndPoint Backup job(s)

trigger_prototype.name: Less than 2Gb remaining on the repository {#REPONAME}
The VEEAM work {#JOBTAPENAME} is still running (8h)

item_prototype.name: Windows Agent 3 day backup history
item_prototype.description: This item returns a 1 if the last 3 jobs failed

trigger_prototype.name: 3 Days of backups have failed for {#JOBNAME}
trigger_prototype.description: The last 3 days of backups have failed for {#JOBNAME}

item_prototype.name: Windows Agent 7 day backup history
item_prototype.description: This item returns a 1 if the last 7 jobs failed

trigger_prototype.description: The last 7 days of backups have failed for {#JOBNAME}

item_prototype.name: Windows Agent 14 day backup history
item_prototype.description: This item returns a 1 if the last 14 jobs failed

trigger_prototype.name: 14 Days of backups have failed for {#JOBNAME}
trigger_prototype.description: The last 14 days of backups have failed for {#JOBNAME}

mapping.newvalue: Disabled, First Backup or no history
